fiftyone.mobile.detection.webapp

Class BaseServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • fiftyone.mobile.detection.webapp.BaseServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class BaseServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Adds functionality to a base HttpServlet to provide properties associated with the requesting device. The Listener must be included in the web configuration.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getResult

        protected Map<String,String[]> getResult(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                  throws IOException
        Returns the result set associated with the request provided. If this is the first time the method is called the result will be stored in the HttpServletRequest's attribute collection so that it does not need to be fetched again in the future.
        Parameters:
        request - the request property results are for.
        Returns:
        a set of results containing access to properties.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getProvider

        protected WebProvider getProvider(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        the active provider for the system.

      • getProperty

        protected String getProperty(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             String propertyName)
                      throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                             IOException
        Returns the value associated with the device property requested.
        Parameters:
        request - the request property results are for.
        propertyName - device property name required.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • join

        protected String join(String[] values)
        Joins a list of strings into a comma separated string.
        Parameters:
        values - list of values to join
        Returns:
        single string comma separated
